content: *berroco yarns for this pattern have been discontinued directions are still available * *cali is crocheted in nostalgia with a floral belt crocheted in a matching suede berroco com * construction schematics for sweater are provided finished measurements bust closed 36 40-44-48 length 24 24 1/2-25-25 1/2 materials 14 16-18-20 balls berroco nostalgia 50 grs #6650 chocolate icing mc for **sweater** alternate yarn 7 8-9-10 hanks berroco ultra alpaca 100 grs 3 balls berroco suede 50 grs #3717 wild bill hickock cc for **belt** crochet hook size 5 50 mm i or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle gauge 15 single_crochet s or double_crochet s = 4 10 row = 4 in pat st with mc on size 5 50 mm i hook 1 flower measures 3 1/2 across with cc on size 5 50 mm i hook
